mentionedBy.name: Cisco Systems Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Major competitive development: HPE acquired Juniper for ~$14B in July 2025. Provides high-performance networking solutions (routing, switching, security) with heavy investment in AI-based network automation via Mist AI platform. Holds ~10.2% router market share, third behind Cisco and Huawei.

2025.note: Major competitive development: HPE acquired Juniper for ~$14B in July 2025. Provides high-performance networking solutions (routing, switching, security) with heavy investment in AI-based network automation via Mist AI platform. Holds ~10.2% router market share, third behind Cisco and Huawei.
